}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|WFA78374|07/04/2018}}
"H86D2TQ1D502 VER:A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Internal photos are not detailed enough to identify most chips so many details are assumed to be very similar to the first [[Huawei AP6050DN]]. This new version has four separate FEMs for both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz radios whereas the earlier version only had two FEMs for each radio which each handled two spatial streams.
*[[Huawei AP6050DN]] - ''802.11ac Wi-Fi AP'' :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8068 1.4GHz Dual Core :WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4T4R :LAN: 2x [[Broadcom]] B50612EB1KMLG PHY
===Specifications=== [http://e.huawei.com/en/related-page/products/enterprise-network/wlan/indoor-access-points/ap6050dn-ap6150dn/brochure/wlan-ap6050dn-ap6150dn Specifications on '''Huawei'''] *MIMO: Spatial Streams: 4x4:4 (SU-MIMO), 4x4:3 (MU-MIMO) *AP6050DN: Antenna: Gain: 2.4GHz: 6dBi, 5GHz: 6dBi :Type: 4x Built-in omni-directional dual-band antenna *Power rating: DC 12V/2A or PoE 48V/0.6A (802.3at)
